channel.title: Postgresql on Technical Solutions for the 10X Engineers
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on Technical Solutions for the 10X Engineers

item.title: Solving Performance Issues in Postgresql with Distributed Machine Learning
item.description: Introduction At ShitOps, we faced a serious problem with our database system. As a leading tech company, we have various applications that run on top of our databases. Our main database system is running on Postgresql, which had become the primary cause of performance issues. We were facing major issues related to query speed and storage space. Our database was becoming inefficient day by day due to excessive write operations from Hamburg office.
